text:
We at Go-Jek are hiring Devs for Android and for other positions(backend,devops,data analysts)  at <http://go-jek.com> for both Locations Bangalore,India and Jakarta,Indonesia, if you are interested in joining then drop a mail at <mailto:abhinandank@go-jek.com|abhinandank@go-jek.com>  :slightly_smiling_face:
To add we work on latest and cool stuff with more emphasis on TDD, MVP, MVVM patterns on Android and use cool things  like Databinding, Rx Android, DI etc, and these are NOT prerequisites for applying

attachments.title: GO-JEK Indonesia
attachments.text: GO-JEK is your personal time saver. Our drivers are spread across the area ready to pick you up, deliver your items, do your shopping and food for you! Available on Android and iPhone.
